text: Albert van der Haar (;Van in isolation: . born 29 December 1975 in Meppel, Drenthe) is a Dutch former footballer, who played for FC Zwolle most of his career. He also played two seasons for Willem II. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:People from Meppel Category:Dutch footballers Category:PEC Zwolle players Category:Willem II (football club) players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Association football defenders
title: Albert van der Haar
